definition: fat/fertile/loose-fitting or large/to fertilize/to become rich by illegal means/fertilizer/manure

sentences.english: Hamsters do not need to bath with water and soap like humans.
sentences.chinese: 倉鼠不需要像人那樣用水和肥皂沖涼。

sentences.english: Paint a bar of soap completely with clear nail polish so it won't suds up.
sentences.chinese: 在一條肥皂上塗滿卸甲油，這樣肥皂不再起泡。

sentences.english: Paint a bar of soap completely with clear nail polish so it won't suds up.
sentences.chinese: 在一條肥皂上塗滿卸甲油，這樣肥皂不再起泡。

sentences.english: Wash repellent-treated skin with soap and water after coming indoors.
sentences.chinese: 驅蚊洗治療皮膚用肥皂和水以後，在室內。

sentences.english: The soap lathers up in an instant and gives off an expensive scent.
sentences.chinese: 這種肥皂會立即起泡並散發出高雅香味。

sentences.english: Rockier than a soap opera marriage.
sentences.chinese: 比肥皂劇的婚禮還要糟糕。

sentences.english: "We are recommending hand-washing with soap, " Ms Dooley said.
sentences.chinese: “我們建議用肥皂洗手，”Dooley女士說。

sentences.english: Use warm, running water, soap and a personal towel.
sentences.chinese: 使用適溫的自來水，肥皂和個人毛巾。

sentences.english: Could Kim Jong Il's regime really be brought undone by K-pop and South Korean soap operas?
sentences.chinese: 金正日政權真的有可能被韓國音樂和肥皂劇推翻嗎？

sentences.english: Handwash your ball with a soft cloth and warm soapy water.
sentences.chinese: 用布蘸取熱肥皂水清洗健身球。

sentences.english: Others only looked at the soap or sniffed it.
sentences.chinese: 其他人只能看着肥皂泡或聞着肥皂味。

sentences.english: Others only looked at the soap or sniffed it.
sentences.chinese: 其他人只能看着肥皂泡或聞着肥皂味。

sentences.english: Write "I love you" on the bathroom mirror with a piece of soap.
sentences.chinese: 用一塊肥皂在衛生間裏的鏡子上寫“我愛你”。

sentences.english: As a result, networks will be rerunning some late-night talk shows and soap operas.
sentences.chinese: 結果是，網絡將播放一些午夜脫口秀和肥皂劇。

sentences.english: Rub hands together to make a lather and scrub all surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 搓手產生肥皂沫，用力擦洗所有表面。

sentences.english: Its prime-time schedule is packed with reality TV and soap operas.
sentences.chinese: 他的黃金時間節目表中充滿了紀實節目和肥皂劇。

definition: shower puff/bath sponge/bath ball (containing aromas or salts)
